mapper.insert: INSERT INTO myorder (order_id, order_subject, order_body, amount, seller_id, alipay_no, status, refund_money, create_time, update_time, user_email, conference_name) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{orderSubject}, #{orderBody}, #{amount}, #{sellerId}, #{payNo}, #{status}, #{refundMoney}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{userEmail}, #{conferenceName});
mapper.select: SELECT id, order_id AS orderId, order_subject AS orderObject, amount, seller_id AS sellerId, alipay_no AS payNo, status, refund_money AS refundMoney, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime, user_email AS userEmail, conference_name AS conferenceName FROM myorder WHERE order_id = #{orderId};

SELECT id, order_id AS orderId, order_subject AS orderObject, amount, seller_id AS sellerId, alipay_no AS payNo, status, refund_money AS refundMoney, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime, user_email AS userEmail, conference_name AS conferenceName FROM myorder WHERE user_email = #{userEmail};
